definition: for the sake of/in order to
abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]
to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)

sentences.english: Able to reveal weaknesses in the structure in order to optimize the structure design.
sentences.chinese: 能夠揭示出結構的薄弱環節，以利於優化結構設計。

sentences.english: Sleeps when should keep the window seam, favors lets the outdoor fresh air unceasing exile.
sentences.chinese: 睡覺時應留些窗縫，以利於讓室外新鮮空氣不斷流人。

sentences.english: The government by law and the law must become gradually suitably forgive favor the society to be harmonious.
sentences.chinese: 法治和法律要逐漸變得適當寬容以利於社會和諧。

sentences.english: Combustibility of producer gas is compared with other fuel gas to use rationally low calorific value gas.
sentences.chinese: 對其燃燒特性進行比較，以利於合理使用低熱值煤氣。

sentences.english: Endoscopes should be hung in a vertical position to facilitate drying.
sentences.chinese: 應垂直懸掛內鏡以利於乾燥。

sentences.english: A thermal relief is used on plane layers for thru-hole components to make soldering and desoldering easier.
sentences.chinese: 限熱槽通常用於直插元件的內電層以利於焊接和拆焊。

sentences.english: Harnessing emotions sothat you can take positive actions
sentences.chinese: 控制好情緒以利於你採取積極行動，哪怕是面臨困境。

sentences.english: In addition, each time measured when blood pressure the basic body posture should be same, favor the comparison.
sentences.chinese: 此外，每次測血壓時的基本體位應相同，以利於比較。

sentences.english: All the information in this form shall be correct so that Michael could arrange all the work in the right time.
sentences.chinese: 表中的各項信息必須準確，以利於黃政安排各項工作。

sentences.english: We layer the crops to make them grow better.
sentences.chinese: 我們對農作物進行壓條處理，以利於他們生長。

sentences.english: Make music to the proper density billet, for the fungus growth.
sentences.chinese: 使曲坯達到適當的密度，以利於菌類生長。

sentences.english: My legs are long with sharp claws for hanging.
sentences.chinese: 我的腿長，且帶有利爪，以利於懸掛。
